title: `-Clink-arg=-fuse-ld=lld` reports 'cannot find ld'

labels.name: A-linkage
labels.description: Area: linking into static, shared libraries and binaries

labels.name: A-diagnostics
labels.description: Area: Messages for errors, warnings, and lints

body:
What it actually means is 'cannot find lld', which is different - you can have one installed but not the other.

This comes from gcc, so you could make a reasonable case for this being an upstream bug.
